features.featureTitle: Update the frontend ProductCatalog and ProductCard components to display the new exact product data fetched from the backend. The 'For Babies' tab must show the 4 baby products (CloudSoft Baby Shampoo, CloudSoft Baby Conditioner, PureCuddle Baby Body Wash, PureCuddle Baby Lotion) with their full descriptions and exact prices. The 'For Adults' tab must show the 5 adult products (CalmCare Shampoo, CalmCare Conditioner, SootheSilk Body Wash, SootheSilk Lotion, RenewGlow Serum) with their full descriptions and exact prices. Each ProductCard must display: the product name, the full description text, the exact single price (e.g. '$12', '$22'), and the 'Add to Cart' button. Update the emoji fallback icons on ProductCard to be appropriate for each product type (e.g., ðŸ§´ for body wash, ðŸ«§ for shampoo, ðŸ§´ for lotion, âœ¨ for serum). Ensure the adult tab grid accommodates 5 cards gracefully (e.g., last card centered or full-width on the last row).
